thread.title: Win an Aston Martin course to celebrate the release of SPECTRE
thread.title_full: Win an Aston Martin course to celebrate the release of SPECTRE - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win an Aston Martin course to celebrate the release of SPECTRE
text: To celebrate the release of SPECTRE , in cinemas nationwide on Monday, October 26, 2015, readers can win fantastic prizes every day for a month with The Telegraph’s 30-day SPECTRE giveaway. On Saturday you have the chance to win an Aston Martin performance driving course for two at Millbrook Proving Ground in Bedford. After getting behind the wheel of an Aston Martin from the British luxury brand’s current model range, you’ll be able to develop your driving skills in a number of challenging environments, putting the car through its paces on an action-packed day in the driving seat. Prizes also include a holiday to the Sahara, Sony RX100 cameras, Sony Z5 Phone and much more. James Bond (Daniel Craig) embarks on a rogue mission, during which he meets beautiful widow Lucia Sciarra (Monica Bellucci) and uncovers a sinister organisation, Spectre. New security chief Max Denbigh (Andrew Scott) questions Bond’s actions and the relevance of MI6, led by M (Ralph Fiennes). Bond enlists Moneypenny (Naomie Harris) and Q (Ben Whishaw) to seek out Madeleine Swann (Léa Seydoux), the daughter of his old nemesis Mr White (Jesper Christensen), who may be able to untangle the web of SPECTRE . How to claim See the newspaper on Saturday, September 26, 2015 for full details on how to enter. telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
